name: Thor

abilities.name: Mjolnir Strike
abilities.details: Strikes enemies with his enchanted hammer, Mjolnir.

abilities.name: Mjolnir Throw
abilities.details: Throws Mjolnir, which returns after hitting an enemy or max range.

abilities.name: God of Thunder
abilities.details: Calls down a powerful lightning strike on a target location.

abilities.name: Hammer Spin
abilities.details: Spins Mjolnir rapidly, deflecting projectiles and dealing minor damage nearby.

ultimate.name: Bifrost Strike
ultimate.effect: Summons the Bifrost to strike a target location after a delay, dealing massive damage.
ultimate.details: Calls upon the power of Asgard's rainbow bridge.

passives.name: Asgardian Physiology
passives.details: Super strength, durability. Gains minor damage reduction when near allies?

lore: The Norse God of Thunder, Thor Odinson is the prince (and sometimes king) of Asgard. Wielding the enchanted hammer Mjolnir, he commands storms and possesses immense strength and durability.

comics.title: Thor (various series, particularly by Simonson, Aaron)
